latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Monitoring Inspection Non-Routine - Passed inspection with no violations

violations.Violation Summary: Windows excluding fire escape windows in a child care service observed without window guards in a child care service
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was observed that child care service failed to provide appropriate guards on designated structures/equipment to protect children from potential injury
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection lavatory facilities failed to be provided with child high/accessible toilets and sinks
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection floors/walls ceilings were observed not maintained in disrepair or covered in a toxic finish
violations.Category: Minor violations General Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined/observed that food service worker not provided with appropriate food thermometer during food prep
violations.Category: Minor violations General Violations
